h: Kanwariya killed, four family members injured in Road accident in Jharkhand's Dumka
sub_h: One 'Kanwariya' died and four other members of his family sustained injuries in a Road accident in Jharkhand's Dumka district on Tuesday, a police officer said. The accident took place when the SUV they were riding in struck a roadside tree on the Dumka-Bhagalpur route, said Rohit Kumar, officer-in-charge of Hansdiha police station.

h: One dead, four injured in Ramgarh accident
4 die, 4 hurt in 2 accidents
10 die in a fortnight in Road accidents
sub_h: At least 10 persons, including two Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) personnel and a photo journalist, died and more than 40 people were injured in separate Road accidents on the two highways passing through Ramgarh in a fortnight.

h: Four of a family die in Road accident
2 jawans among 5 killed in Ramgarh accidents
2 kids among 4 dead in Road accident
Teams to identify accident-prone zones on NH-33
Two die in Godda Road accident
sub_h: In a Road accident on Friday night, two employees of an outsourcing company working for the Adani Power Plant were killed. Five people have died in Road accidents in the district since January 1. The deceased are Brambhadeo Pandit of Lehri Tola in Uttar Pradesh and Vinod Kumar of Sahibganj in Uttar Pradesh. They were killed on their way home when a speeding car hit their motorcycle at about 7:30 PM near Pakadiya village under the town police station. The collision was so intense that the duo was thrown 50 meters away. The driver of the car, who is yet to be identified, was seemingly drunk and is being treated at a private hospital.

h: Two killed in Road accident
sub_h: A driver and a helper died when their vehicle overturned after hitting a road barrier near the Ring Road in Ranchi city on Friday. The deceased have been identified as Bali Karmali (22) and Chaita Bedia (26).

h: Dhanbad cybercrime DSP injured in Road accident in Ramgarh
sub_h: A deputy superintendent of police in Dhanbad was injured after his motorcycle collided head on with an incoming car in a bend on a state highway in Ormanjhi-Gola state on Friday morning. The officer was taken to a private hospital in Ranchi immediately and is now stable. A highway rescue team comprising 10 people who usually patrol the accident prone valley first spotted the injured officer and rescued him.

h: Awareness will bring down Road accidents: E S’bhum DC
sub_h: The article discusses how the city of East Singhbhum is seeing an increase in accidents, and how the government is trying to address the issue. The article also discusses how parents and children can help to reduce accidents by being aware of traffic rules, and by using caution when driving.

h: Four labourers die, 20 hurt in Seraikela-Kharsawan accident
sub_h: A Road accident in Seraikelakharsawan district killed four people and injured 20 others. The victims were from different parts of Chaibasa district in West Singbhum district in eastern India.

h: Two dead, 3 injured in Deoghar Road accident
sub_h: A car crashed into a truck parked at a crosswalk, injuring three people. The driver and a passenger in the car were killed, and the three people injured were later identified as residents of a nearby village. The driver is believed to have been going to Deoghar from Sarwan when the accident occurred. The police are investigating the cause of the crash.

h: 2 persons killed, 6 injured in Road accident
sub_h: A bolero hit a trailer near Banta village under the silli police station area of Ranchi district on Wednesday, killing two people and injuring six others. The deceased have been identified as Mantu Manjhi and his brother ritesh Manjhi, both in their late 20s. All injured persons have been sent to Rajendra Institute of Medical Sciences for treatment. The victims were returning from Goonj’ a cultural festival in Silli to their homes in Bundu at around 2 am when their vehicle tried to overtake in a turning it dashed against the heavy vehicle coming from opposite direction. Kundan Pahan, former top leader of the CPI Maoist was acquitted the court of Additional Judicial Commissioner Manoj Chandra Jha on Wednesday. Pahan's advocate ishwar Dayal said that court acquitted the accused for lack of evidence. He said that since the encounter had taken place in the evening, none of the witnesses said they had seen and identified Pahan at the site. It may be stated here that Pahan has been acquitted in several cases for lack of evidence ever since he surrendered before the police in 2017. He is also facing trial in the murder of MLA Ramesh Singh Munda in 2008.

h: Transport minister’s Seraikela aide dies in accident
sub_h: A senior JMM leader of Seraikela-Kharsawan district, Dharma Murmu (40), who was also the local representative of transport minister Champai Soren in his constituency (Seraikela) died in a Road accident in Rajnagar police station limits on Thursday morning.

h: 1 dead, 2 hurt in Road accident
sub_h: A 25-year-old youth of Seraikela-Kharsawan district died on the spot, while two others received serious injuries when their motorcycle hit a road divider on the Kadma-Sonari link road on Sunday, police said.

h: Two girls killed in Jharkhand Road accident
sub_h: The incident occurred in Satbarwa area when nine people, all relatives, were returning to Ramanujganj in neighbouring Chattisgarh in a sports utility vehicle (SUV) after attending a wedding ceremony in Gumla district of the state.

h: Gas tanker explodes after overturning in Jharkhand's Dumka, 1 killed
sub_h: One person was killed and another injured after a gas tanker overturned after hitting a bus that was parked on the roadside in Jharkhand's Dumka district on Thursday afternoon, following which it exploded and caught fire.

h: 4 dead, 5 injured in Road accidents in Jharkhand
sub_h: The deceased were identified as Rajesh Kumar Sinha (55) and his son Aditya Raj (16). Rajesh died on the spot, while his son died on the way to the hospital.

h: Six killed in three Road accidents in 24 hours
sub_h: At least six persons were killed in three separate Road accidents in East Singhbhum, Seraikela-Kharswan and Chatra districts in the last 24 hours, police said on Monday.

h: Four dead, five hurt in Ramgarh Road accident
sub_h: At least four persons were killed and five critically injured in an accident involving six vehicles at Patel Chowk on NH-33 under Ramgarh town police station on Tuesday.

h: 8 killed in Road accidents in Jharkhand
sub_h: The driver of the bus was also critically injured and admitted to a hospital, police said, adding, the deceased include two men, two women and a teenage boy.

h: 6 labourers killed, 18 injured in Road accident in Jharkhand
sub_h: Six labourers, including three women, were killed and 18 others injured in a head-on collision between a pickup van and a truck in Hariharganj in Jharkhand's Palamu district on Friday, an official said.

h: Jharkhand: Four members of a family killed, 2 injured in Road accident
sub_h: Four members of a family were killed and two injured after the car they were travelling rammed into a stationary container in Jharkhand's Seraikela-Kharswan district on Friday, police said.

h: Jharkhand: Woman killed in autorickshaw-bike collision
sub_h: A 32-year-old woman, returning home after being administered a dose of Covid-19 vaccine, was killed in a Road accident at Kodarmakala village in Palamu district on Thursday, police said.

h: East Singhbhum saw maximum Road accidents in Kolhan last year
sub_h: Among the three districts of the Kolhan region, East Singhbhum saw the maximum number of Road accidents in 2020, revealed a data.

h: 3 killed, 4 injured in bike collision in Jharkhand
sub_h: Three youngsters were killed and a couple and their two minor children sustained injuries when their bikes collided with each other at Edelbera on Chakradharpur-Kharsawan road under Chakradharpur police station limits on Monday.

h: 1 dies, 3 hurt in Bokaro Road accident
Jharkhand: Hazaribag SP among six hurt in Road accident in Ramgarh
sub_h: As many as six persons, including Hazaribag SP Kartik S, sustained injuries on Monday when Kartik’s SUV rammed into a truck on National Highway-33 under Ramgarh Town police station area.

h: Five killed, three injured in Road accidents in Jharkhand
sub_h: Five people were killed and three others injured in two Road accidents in Jharkhand on Friday, police said. Three people were killed and three others injured when a bauxite-laden truck fell off a cliff while negotiating a sharp turn in Netarhat Hills in Bishunpur police station area in Gumla district, an officer said.

h: 3 dead, 5 injured in Ramgarh Road accident
Lockdown relaxed, number of Road accident deaths increases in Jharkhand
Jharkhand records 70% dip in Road accidents during lockdown: Transport department
sub_h: Jharkhand witnessed a 70% reduction in Road accidents during the lockdown period between March and May this year, the data compiled by the road safety wing of the state transport department has revealed.

h: Three die in two Road accidents
